name: Crystal-Clear-Photorealistic
description:
Visit Civitai-Crystal team on discord! -news, updates, development, beta testing

Join RunDiffusion on discord! - Auto1111 and InvokeAI in the cloud.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In the attempt to break the barrier between what's digital and what's real, one model rose to the challenge:


Crystal-Clear-Photorealistic

Now you can generate images as realistic in appearance as your prompt allows it.
This model was not developed for something specific so feel free to try out different things.
From regular portraits to sci-fi aliens in the 5th dimension. It should be able to generate a full body view of things at 704x1088(raw) without any mutations or duplicates.
You can go far, with your creations, by having a good prompt that has a good negative to it as well.

This model is the accumulated result of intense testing, training, feedback and minute detail improvements, upon the Crystal framework, done by an entire team of people over a 3 week period.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

If your computer is not strong enough, a solution to your problem is RunDiffusion where you can generate your favorite CIVITAI models or you can train new models/LORAs or embeddings.

The model is based on the Crystal-Framework which was created to produce clean, noiseless and unrivaled image quality, while adjusting the colors and sharpness of the image. Although, CC-Photorealistic cannot compete with Crystal-Clear when it comes to producing proper content at very high resolutions, it is unrivaled in the realism domain. Be it food, houses, interiors, animals, nature, photography the choice is yours.
Future versions of this model will tackle the resolution issue !

Note: To produce high realism images, it is advise to use a low CFG ( between 4 and 7).

The model was not tested for mature content or how well it produces it !
Feel free to post your images and feedback, also, don't forget to join the Discord (extra goodies and models available):
Visit Civitai Crystal-Clear on Discord!

If you do plan to include this model in your creations, please show us what you have accomplished! We will also help promote your model if you give us the deserved credit.

modelVersions.name: -Photorealistic
modelVersions.description:
Crystal-Clear-Photorealistic purpose is to create an image that is as close to realism as possible.

Based on the Crystal framework trained locally.
